name: 美食梦工厂：研发美食开心制作糖果模拟经营养成

description:
Important note: This is only a very cheap game, please make sure you like this game to buy again, now there are many shortcomings, thank you
We are actually a few students who love game development, no experience, no money to do this game, we are more in learning to try to tell the story of our hearts, we developed this game in very difficult circumstances. So please do not expect too much of this game, please be careful to buy, in case you do not like to buy the game, thank you very much for your support, thank you for your understanding.

  • Candy is the food that brings happiness.
  • And here is the world of candy!
  • In order to in those years is sugar decayed tooth, respect you ~ go not hatred ✧ (≖ ◡ ≖ ✿
  • Life without sugar. What is the difference between that and salted fish ヾ (. ` Д ´.) ﾉ 彡
  • Two bags are not expensive.
  • Life must be happy, two bags of rainbow acid?
  • Do not worry about the road ahead without friends, Alps do not give you!
  • Little lotus just shows sharp Angle, big white rabbit ah not little ~
  • Have you ever wondered where delicious candy comes from?
  • Become the owner of the candy workshop, from manufacturing to selling, with each candy walk their whole life!
  • A variety of raw materials, a variety of crafts, rich types of candy.
  • Make lovely candies by yourself and attract guests with delicious candies.
  • The game as a whole is very Buddha, collect the paint for making candy, and then remember the recipe for making candy.
  • Make candy from the recipe and sell it in your own little shop
  • As development gathers resources, unlocking more maps:
  • Here you can see the other side of the candy to hear the story behind it.
  • The unique shape, the interesting story, along with the surprise candy is the best!
